definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: According to the weather forecast, it is going to rain.
sentences.chinese: 根據兲芞預報，兲將丅雨。

sentences.english: Don't forget about the guy beneath you.
sentences.chinese: 卟崾忘記，約傢夥丅方您。

sentences.english: You buy cheap ammo by the case.
sentences.chinese: 你成箱購買廉價彈丅藥。

sentences.english: Only leaves behind that share to exude the yellow pledge.
sentences.chinese: 只畱丅內份泛黃旳承諾。
中國人的確非常出色丅。

sentences.english: I'd roll outta bed in the morning.
Hot line pass place leave death and destroy , black smoke get up city succeed the ruins at once.
sentences.chinese: 熱線濄処留丅死亡與毀滅，潶煙起処城鈰頓宬廢墟。

definition: one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "ra"), an ancient Korean writing system
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "myeon"), an ancient Korean writing system
one of the characters used in kwukyel (phonetic "keum"), an ancient Korean writing system
